column4: i have strange problem , gparted and ubuntu installer can't read my partitions and read my hard as unallocated , and i can easily access partitions through "Nautilus" , here is a screenshot http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/5143/screenshotlv.png any one can help because i can't install ubuntu !
You need /dev/sdaX, where X is the number of your partition.
